compliant.section: 個人資料的蒐集、處理及利用方式
compliant.legal provisions: The collection, processing, and use of personal data must be for specific, legitimate purposes and must be limited to what is necessary.
Data controllers must implement appropriate security measures to protect personal data.
Individuals have the right to access, correct, delete, and restrict the processing of their personal data.
Users must be informed about the use of cookies and have the option to refuse them.

non_compliant.section: 與第三人共用個人資料之政策
non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data should not be shared with third parties without explicit consent, except in specific legal circumstances.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the conditions under which personal data may be shared with third parties, ensuring explicit consent is obtained in all cases unless legally mandated.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Data controllers must ensure that third-party links comply with data protection standards.
non_compliant.amend: Include a statement that the company is not responsible for the data protection practices of third-party sites and encourage users to review their privacy policies.
